Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 Review
Cons: Video recording doesn't adjust when vooming during recording session but I didn't buy it for it's recording quality.
Pros: Excellent pictures, good video recording, and great price when on sale.
Comments: If you are looking for a small camera that can take great pictures in a variety of ways, and can get it on sale, it is worth picking up. I have one, and my mom has one.
